name: Mobile Operator
long_description:
Stop manually testing your app. Simply connect Mobile Operator to your CI/CD and let our AI agents take over. They explore your app like real users, not only catching crashes and bugs but also spotting UX problems. 
Within 2 hours of testing, youâ€™ll receive a detailed report highlighting everything that needs fixing, so you can fix it and release with confidence
one_liner: AI agent that does QA on mobile apps
